member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_QUERY_META_COMMAND
member.summary: Indicates the level of support that the adapter provides for metacommands.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_QUERY_META_COMMAND.CommandId
member.summary: The fixed GUID that identifies the metacommand to query about.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_QUERY_META_COMMAND.NodeMask
member.summary: For single GPU operation, this is zero. If there are multiple GPU nodes, a bit is set to identify a node (the device's physical adapter). Each bit in the mask corresponds to a single node. Only 1 bit must be set. Refer to Multi-adapter systems.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_QUERY_META_COMMAND.pQueryInputData
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer containing the query input data. Allocate QueryInputDataSizeInBytes bytes.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_QUERY_META_COMMAND.QueryInputDataSizeInBytes
member.summary: The size of the buffer pointed to by pQueryInputData, in bytes.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_QUERY_META_COMMAND.pQueryOutputData
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer containing the query output data.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_QUERY_META_COMMAND.QueryOutputDataSizeInBytes
member.summary: The size of the buffer pointed to by pQueryOutputData, in bytes.
